languages.text: {n}В голосе гемункула звучит издевка.{/n} "Забудь, мон-кай, обещания, что были даны до войны. Лояльных мне слуг сейчас режут по всей Прорве. Предельный груз, который я могу теперь отсюда вытащить, уже заполнен более ценными образцами, чем ты".

{n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе гемункула звучит издевка.{/n} "Забудь, мон-кай, обещания, что были даны до войны. Лояльных мне слуг сейчас режут по всей Прорве. Предельный груз, который я могу теперь отсюда вытащить, уже заполнен более ценными образцами, чем ты".

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice.{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. Servants loyal to me are being gutted all across the Chasm. I have reached the limit of what and whom I can take with me, and each of those specimens is more valuable than you."

{n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice.{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. Servants loyal to me are being gutted all across the Chasm. I have reached the limit of what and whom I can salvage and take with me, and each of those specimens is more valuable than you."

{n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice.{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more away with me, and each of those specimens is far more valuable than you."

{n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice.{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more away with me, and each of those specimens is far more valuable than you."

{n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

{n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

languages.text: {n}Vous percevez la moquerie dans la voix de l'hémoncule.{/n} « Oubliez mes promesses, mon-keigh. La guerre est déclarée. Partout dans l'Abîme, mes loyaux serviteurs se font massacrer. Je ne peux pas emporter d'autres spécimens, et ceux que j'ai déjà ont bien plus de valeur que vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous percevez la moquerie dans la voix de l'hémoncule.{/n} « Oubliez mes promesses, mon-keigh. La guerre est déclarée. Partout dans l'Abîme, mes loyaux serviteurs se font massacrer. Je ne peux pas emmener quiconque avec moi, et chacun de ces spécimens a plus de valeur que vous. »

languages.text: {n}你听到血伶人的声音中充满了嘲弄之意。{/n}“那些话你就当我没说过吧，猴子。战争已经打响，我忠诚的仆人们在整个裂隙惨遭屠杀。我没法带走更多实验对象了，其余的实验对象每个都比你更有价值。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到血伶人的声音中充满了嘲弄之意。{/n}“那些话你就当我没说过吧，猴子。战争已经打响，我忠诚的仆人们在整个裂隙惨重屠杀。我没法带走更多实验对象了，其余的实验对象每个都比你更有价值。”

languages.text: {n}Du hörst Spott in der Stimme des Haemonculus:{/n} "Vergesst die alten Versprechen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wir sind im Krieg. Meine treuen Diener werden in der gesamten Kluft abgeschlachtet. Ich kann meine weiteren Versuchsstücke mitnehmen und jene, die ich bereits verpackt habe, sind für Euch von weit größerem Wert."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst Spott in der Stimme des Haemonculus.{/n} "Vergesst die alten Versprechen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wir sind im Krieg. Meine treuen Diener werden in der gesamten Kluft abgeschlachtet. Ich kann keine weiteren mitnehmen, und jedes dieser Versuchsstücke ist deutlich wertvoller als Ihr."

languages.text: {n}El Hemónculo habla con un tono mordaz.{/n} «Olvida las viejas promesas, mon-keigh. Es la guerra. Están masacrando a mis leales sirvientes en el Abismo. No puedo llevar más especímenes conmigo, y todos y cada uno de los que ya he elegido son más valiosos que tú».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Hemónculo habla con un tono mordaz.{/n} «Esas promesas han muerto, mon-keigh. La guerra ha comenzado. Están asesinando a mis leales sirvientes en el Abismo. No puedo llevar más especímenes conmigo, y todos y cada uno son más valiosos que tú».

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスの声には嘲笑が含まれている。{/n}「昔の約束など忘れるんだ、モン＝ケイ。これは戦争だ。私の忠実な従者たちは裂け目の向こうで虐殺されているのだぞ。これ以上の標本を持っていけないし、それにこれらの標本はどれも、お前よりはるかに貴重なものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスの声には嘲笑が含まれている。{/n}「昔の約束など忘れるんだ、モン＝ケイ。これは戦争だ。私の忠実な従者たちは裂け目の向こうで虐殺されているのだぞ。これ以上の標本を持っていけないし、それにこれらの標本はどれも、お前よりはるかに貴重なものだ」

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus'un sesindeki alaycılığı duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Eski sözleri unut mon-keigh. Bu bir savaş. Sadık hizmetkârlarım Yarık'ın dört bir yanında katlediliyor. Yanımda daha fazla numune götüremem, aldıklarım da senden çok daha değerli."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear mockery in the Haemonculus's voice:{/n} "Forget the old promises, mon-keigh. This is war. My loyal servants are being slaughtered across the Chasm. I cannot take any more specimens away with me, and the ones I have already packed are far more valuable than you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus'un sesindeki alaycılığı duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Eski sözleri unut mon-keigh. Bu bir savaş. Sadık hizmetkârlarım Yarık'ın dört bir yanında katlediliyor. Yanımda daha fazla numune götüremem ve aldıklarım senden çok daha değerli."
